      class  Farmer
      Represents farmers in the Zombie game world.
      class  Human
      Class representing an ordinary human.

      Represents the priestess, which is the source of the local zombie epidemic in the zombie game world.

      This is a class representing a zombie.

      Harvest the ripe crop to become food.
      java.lang.String GrowlAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Zombie growls.
      java.lang.String FertiliseAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Fertilise the unripe Crop object that is at the Farmer's current location.
      java.lang.String EatingAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      If player eats the food, remove the food from the player inventory and add heal points to player.
      java.lang.String CraftWeaponAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Remove the item from the actor inventory and craft the item into different weapon based on its capability and add the weapon back into actor inventory.
      java.lang.String ChantingAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      The actor (Mambo Marie) will chant and create 5 new Zombies at random locations of the map the actor is currently on.
      java.lang.String AttackAction.execute(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Perform the Action.

      Returns a MoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.

      Returns an action that allows the Farmer to sow a crop when he is standing next to a Dirt.
      Action PickUpItemBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns a PickUpItemAction to pick up a weapon, if there is weapon at the actor's location.
      Action HuntBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map) 
      Action HarvestBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an action that allows the actor (Farmer/Player) to harvest a ripe crop when he is standing on or next to a ripe crop.

      Action FollowBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map) 
      Action FertiliseBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an action that allows the Farmer to fertilise when he is standing on an unripe crop.
      Action EatingBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an EatingAction if the current Actor has hit point of value less than half of his maximum hit points and is standing in a location which has a food, else return null.
      Action Behaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      A factory for creating actions.
      Action AttackBehaviour.getAction(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Returns an AttackAction that attacks an adjacent attackable Actor.
      java.util.List<Action> SniperRifle.getAllowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Return a list consisting of UseSniperAction only if the actor is Player, has the sniperRifle which still has bullet in his inventory and is not aiming at a target.
      java.util.List<Action> Shotgun.getAllowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Return a list consisting of ShootingAction only if the actor is Player and has the shotgun which still has bullet in his inventory.
      java.util.List<Action> LongRangedWeapon.getAllowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      If the Player has a shotgun without bullet in his inventory and has at least one ammunition in his inventory, return a list consisting of RefillBulletAction.
      java.util.List<Action> Limb.getAllowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Return a list consisting of CraftWeaponAction only if the actor is Player and has the limb in his inventory.
      java.util.List<Action> Food.getAllowableActions(Actor actor, GameMap map)
      Return a list consisting of EatingAction only if the actor is Player and has the food in his inventory.
      Actions ZombieActor.getAllowableActions(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Return an Actions object consisting of HumanAttackAction if the current actor is Zombie and the other actor is Human.
      Actions Priestess.getAllowableActions(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Returns an empty Actions instance because Priestess cannot attack humans.
